title: Find Maximum Element in Array
description: Write a program to find the maximum element in an array of integers.
hints: Initialize max with first element
Iterate through array comparing each element with current max
Update max if current element is greater

title: Reverse a String
description: Write a program to reverse a given string.
hints: Use two pointers - one at start, one at end
Swap characters and move pointers towards center
Continue until pointers meet

title: Check if Number is Prime
description: Write a program to check whether a given number is prime or not.
hints: Numbers less than 2 are not prime
Check divisibility from 2 to sqrt(n)
If divisible by any number, it's not prime

title: Find Factorial of Number
description: Write a program to calculate the factorial of a given number.
hints: Factorial of n = n * (n-1) * (n-2) * ... * 1
Base case: factorial of 0 and 1 is 1
Can be solved using iteration or recursion

title: Sum of Digits
description: Write a program to find the sum of digits of a given number.
hints: Use modulo (%) operator to get last digit
Use division (/) to remove last digit
Continue until number becomes 0

title: Check Palindrome String
description: Write a program to check if a given string is a palindrome.
hints: Compare characters from both ends
Use two pointers moving towards center
If any pair doesn't match, it's not a palindrome

title: Find GCD of Two Numbers
description: Write a program to find the Greatest Common Divisor (GCD) of two numbers.
hints: Use Euclidean algorithm
GCD(a, b) = GCD(b, a % b)
Base case: when b becomes 0, return a

title: Find LCM of Two Numbers
description: Write a program to find the Least Common Multiple (LCM) of two numbers.
hints: LCM(a, b) = (a * b) / GCD(a, b)
First find GCD of two numbers
Use the formula to calculate LCM

title: Check Armstrong Number
description: Write a program to check if a given number is an Armstrong number (sum of cubes of digits equals the number).
hints: Armstrong number: sum of cubes of digits equals original number
Extract each digit, cube it, and add to sum

title: Print Fibonacci Series
description: Write a program to print the first n numbers of the Fibonacci series.
hints: Fibonacci series: 0, 1, 1, 2, 3, 5, 8, 13, ...
Each number is sum of previous two numbers
Start with first two numbers: 0 and 1
